properties.value: A book of knowledge is the reward from Surprise Exam random events. Reading it grants experience equivalent to 15 times the level of the selected skill, 50% more than a genie lamp's 10 times multiplier. Two books of knowledge cannot be obtained at once, however it is still possible to get a second Surprise Exam random event and the reward will be either an uncut gem or coins.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Book of knowledge
This article is about the random even reward. For the Arceuus Library reward, see Book of arcane knowledge.
Book of knowledge
Released17 July 2007 (Update)

Advanced data
Item ID11640

A book of knowledge is the reward from Surprise Exam random events. Reading it grants experience equivalent to 15 times the level of the selected skill, 50% more than a genie lamp's 10 times multiplier. Two books of knowledge cannot be obtained at once, however it is still possible to get a second Surprise Exam random event and the reward will be either an uncut gem or coins.

If no inventory space is available, the book will be put on floor, but once picked up it cannot be dropped.

Attempting to bank a book of knowledge yields the message: "A magical force prevents you from banking this item!".

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).

[[File:Book of knowledge detail.png|left|140px]]
A '''book of knowledge''' is the reward from [[Surprise Exam]] [[random events]]. Reading it grants [[experience]] equivalent to 15 times the level of the selected [[skills|skill]], 50% more than a [[Lamp|genie lamp]]'s 10 times multiplier. Two books of knowledge '''cannot''' be obtained at once, however it is still possible to get a second Surprise Exam random event and the reward will be either an [[uncut gem]] or [[coins]].

If no inventory space is available, the book will be put on floor, but once picked up it cannot be dropped.

Attempting to bank a book of knowledge yields the message: ''"A magical force prevents you from banking this item!"''.
